messages.subject: Displaying swords
messages.msgSnippet: Dear fellow nihontophiles, I am thinking about redecorating my apartment somewhat and found myself wandering how best to display multible swords? What do
messages.messageBody:
Dear fellow nihontophiles,

I am thinking about redecorating my apartment somewhat and found myself wandering how best to display multible swords?

What do others do? Put a couple out on display ( loose or in a large glass display cabinet?) and keep the rest in the vault?

Do you display the papers with the sword?

Are there others who display lots of swords and tsuba? How do people do this? I don't like the idea of a sword rack on the wall where people can just take the swords off. I am thinking more along the lines of a display behind glass or perspex.

Perhaps other members could post pictures of how they have their swords display? Alternatively email them to me at matthewhoyle@...

Regards, Matthew

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
